Philanthropy

From childhood, I’ve been ingrained with a strong desire to help others. Giving back infuses me with a sense of empowerment.

I am Ismaili

Philanthropy

The amazing group of people I get to work with as the Youth Volunteer Team Leader of my mosque.

My participation in the Backpack Buddies program with my peers has allowed me to help undernourished, inner city kids by collecting and packing food items.

Peer tutoring

I aid my peers by mentoring them in mathematics and chemistry.
